extends java.lang.Object

        public java.lang.String[] raw()
        Return the data as is in it's original container (array)
        Returns:

      • line

        public java.lang.String line()
        Return the last line of the data.

        Note that it will sort out any empty lines and return the last line containing any data

        Returns:
        The last line or NULL if no none-empty lines exists

      • line

        public java.lang.String line(java.lang.Integer aLineNumber)
        Return one line of the data
        Parameters:
        aLineNumber - The line number to return. This also takes negative values which will start from the bottom
        Returns:
        The specified line

      • line

        public java.lang.String line(java.lang.Integer aLineNumber,
                    java.lang.Boolean aSkipEmpty)
        Return one line of the data
        Parameters:
        aLineNumber - The line number to return. This also takes negative values which will start from the bottom
        aSkipEmpty - Do not include empty lines
        Returns:
        The specified line

      • length

        public java.lang.Integer length()
        Return the number of lines within the container
        Returns:
        The number of lines
